summary: The module provides a complete PyTorch implementation of Neural Graph Collaborative Filtering (NGCF) for recommendation tasks. It includes a driver that prepares interaction data, configures the model and optimizer, runs training with early stopping, and evaluates recommendation quality, as well as a model definition that builds user and item embeddings through stacked graph convolution layers, computes Bayesian Personalized Ranking loss, and predicts ratings.
